summary: François' mother, Mme Lepic, hates him and she nicknames him "Poil de Carotte" (Carrot hair). His father is more interested in politics and hunting that he is in him. In spite of the ... See full summary »
cast: Henry Krauss|Charlotte Barbier-Krauss|André Heuzé|Fabien Haziza|Renée Jean|Lydia Zaréna|Suzanne Talba|Yvette Langlais|Nora Sylvère
title: Poil de carotte
